definition: to go to bed/to retire for the night
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while

sentences.english: Rhinoceroses and dragons for once will let us walk in peace.
sentences.chinese: 犀牛与龙安歇，让我们能平静地行走。

sentences.english: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures; he leadeth me beside the still waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我躺卧在青草地上，领我至可安歇的水边。

sentences.english: The Lord builds the home and gives rest to those he loves.
sentences.chinese: 主不但为祂所爱的人建造家庭，也给他们安歇。

sentences.english: In God's green pastures feeding, by His cool waters lie;
sentences.chinese: 主领我到青草地安歇在溪水旁。

sentences.english: When man was unfallen, his God gave him the flowery bowers of Eden as his quiet resting places;
sentences.chinese: 人犯罪以前，上帝赐祂伊甸的花丛作他平静的安歇所。

sentences.english: O king of Assyria, your shepherds slumber; your nobles lie down to rest.
sentences.chinese: 亚述王阿，你的牧人睡觉，你的贵胄安歇。

sentences.english: He makethme to lie down in green pastures, he leadeth me beside the still waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我躺在草地上，领我到可安歇的水边。

sentences.english: He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我躺卧在清草地上，领我在可安歇的水边。

definition: to have a rest/to stay for the night/to go to bed/to sleep
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
to make oneself presentable/to freshen up
to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/undisturbed/peaceful
to make one's home/to take shelter
